acceptance: On upload/import start, a progress indicator appears within 500ms.
Processing states show clear step names: EXIF → Geocode → Caption.
Slideshow indicates play/pause and interval remaining.

manual: Throttle network to 'Slow 3G' and upload a 5–10MB photo; verify progress appears <500ms.
During processing, verify step label updates and never shows a blank state.

heuristics.title: Match between system and the real world

checks.description: Location labels are human-readable (city/landmark) and provenance is explicit.
acceptance: When EXIF GPS exists, show a label like 'Barcelona, Spain' with a 'From EXIF' badge.
Raw coordinates are hidden by default.

manual: Open a photo with GPS; confirm label reads naturally and badge says 'From EXIF'.

checks.description: Users can revert location to EXIF in one action; note edits support Undo.
acceptance: Override shows 'Edited' badge.
Revert restores 'From EXIF' and original label.
After saving a note, a toast with 'Undo' is available for ≥5s.

manual: Edit location to a new label; confirm 'Edited' badge; click Revert and verify EXIF badge returns.
Edit note, save, click Undo; previous content is restored.

checks.description: Edit affordances, badge positions, and focus behavior are consistent across screens.
acceptance: Edit icons (✎) look and behave the same for caption, note, and location.
Badges appear in the same region across gallery/detail.
TV/keyboard focus order is left-to-right, top-to-bottom; no 'focus traps'.

manual: Traverse UI with keyboard/remote only; confirm predictable focus order.

checks.description: Inputs validate inline; dedupe prevents duplicate uploads.
acceptance: Note/caption fields enforce ≤240 chars with live counter.
If perceptual hash matches an existing photo, prompt skip/merge.

manual: Paste 300 chars into note; verify hard limit and counter color at ≥220.
Upload the same image twice; observe dedupe prompt.

checks.description: Preset options and explicit filters reduce memory load.
acceptance: Slideshow interval presents presets: 3/5/10/30s.
Filters include: Has EXIF location, Has user-edited location, Has note.

manual: Open settings and verify presets exist; toggle filters and see expected results.

checks.description: Shortcuts and preferences persist; slideshow responds to remote keys.
acceptance: Space/OK toggles play/pause; ←/→ prev/next.
detailOnly and interval persist per user after reload.

manual: Start slideshow; use remote/keyboard to control; reload and confirm settings persist.

checks.description: Information hierarchy is clear; gallery cards remain minimal.
acceptance: Thumbnails show at most 2 compact chips (note/location).
Detail view: photo > caption > note > location; extra metadata hidden behind disclosure.

manual: Resize to small viewport; ensure text truncates gracefully; no overlap.

heuristics.title: Help users recognize, diagnose, and recover from errors

checks.description: Errors use plain language and offer recovery actions.
acceptance: No EXIF GPS: offer 'Add a location'.
Geocode failure: offer 'Save label only' or 'Enter coordinates'.

manual: Disable geocode service; attempt override; verify fallback actions are offered.
cypress: cy.intercept('/jobs/geocode', { statusCode: 500 }); /* trigger edit */ cy.get("[data-testid='error-banner']").should('contain','Save label only');

checks.description: Contextual help overlay explains badges, controls, and shortcuts.
acceptance: Overlay reachable via keyboard/remote only.
Includes legend: 'From EXIF' vs 'Edited', and slideshow shortcuts.

manual: Open help on TV remote; confirm readability from ~3m distance.

rules: All actionable elements have visible focus states.
Alt text defaults to AI caption; user can edit.

manual: Keyboard-only traversal covers all interactive elements; focus never lost.
Simulate Slow 3G; confirm UI remains responsive

flows.name: Upload → Process → View
acceptance: Upload shows progress <500ms.
Photo appears in grid with 'Processing' then 'Ready'.
Detail view shows AI caption and, if GPS exists, 'From EXIF' location.

flows.name: Location Override → Revert
acceptance: Edited badge appears after override.
Revert restores EXIF badge and original label.

flows.name: Slideshow
acceptance: Interval presets selectable; value persists.
Space/OK toggles play/pause; ←/→ changes photo.
